resources.string:
C2S : Click2Safe is an reliant application which will make women feel safe and empowered. 
This application allows you to call and message your predetermined emergency contacts and nearby police stations at the time of need. 
It has also laws and self defence videos which one can refer which might help in emergency. It contains various helpline numbers which can help anytime and anywhere. 
C2S uses Maps for identifying the current location of the user in trouble and sends the current location to the selected contact via SMS. 
C2S : Click2Safe Application will be helpful to all the women around the globe which will not require any extra efforts and JUST A CLICK.
